title: Adsorption and biodegradation of the azo dye methyl orange using Ralstonia pickettii immobilized in polyvinyl alcohol (PVA)–alginate–hectorite beads (BHec-RP)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18277-18290
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08692E, Paper

Asranudin, Adi Setyo Purnomo, Holilah, Didik Prasetyoko, Noureddine El Messaoudi, Alya Awinatul Rohmah, Alvin Romadhoni Putra Hidayat, Riki Subagyo
Biological methods are widely used to treat dye waste, particularly methyl orange (MO) dye.
